snippet.title: Polymega Gameplays - Truck Racing [PlayStation - PAL]
snippet.description:
Truck Racing is a single player racing game, with trucks racing around a conventional racing track.

The player has six rigs to choose from and eight courses on which they can race, with the maximum speed of the trucks over 150 miles per hour.

Published by Midas Interactive
Developed by Kung Fu Ltd.
BIOS Used: Polymega BIOS
